title: LA Voters Are in a Foul Mood. Will a New Mayor Change Anything?
description: Residents are frustrated over homelessness, crime and rising costs. Two candidates for mayor, Karen Bass and Rick Caruso, say they can turn the tide.
dc:creator: Shawn Hubler
media:description: Protesters demonstrated in late October at a Los Angeles City Council meeting to call on two Council members to resign over participating in a recorded conversation in which racist remarks were made.
